summary: Theme token updates were made in frontend/src/index.css (background/card/primary/foreground in OKLCH and heading styles), but the diff also includes unrelated/non-requested changes such as extensive neon/3D avatar utility styling and updates to project metadata/summary files that go beyond the focused theme-token update request.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/retained extensive non-theme UI styling utilities (e.g., neon-glow/neon-border/neon-pulse, text-shadow utilities) and large blocks of “Enhanced 3D Avatar Styles” in global CSS, which are not part of the requested focused color-token update.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest asks for minimal focused styling changes limited to theme tokens and only directly-related hardcoded colors needed for the new theme; these extra utilities and avatar 3D styling are unrelated to background/card/heading/button color tokens.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/tracking files (project_state.json) not required to implement the theme token changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 emphasizes changing only styling/theme-related files as strictly needed; updating project tracking JSON is not necessary for applying CSS/theme tokens.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated a generated/summary documentation file describing many unrelated app features (e.g., games hub, queries, video generator), which was not requested as part of the UI theme token update.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is limited to focused styling changes; updating broad feature summaries is outside scope and not needed to apply theme colors.
